page.title: 07STOKENCHURCH NURSERY CLASS.
page.content: After 13 years in an old brick building on the A40,the Nursery Class is moving to new premises (at the First School) this September. Bright friezes & an egg_shell collage,Humpty Dumpty, decorate the walls.At 9.30.am in a happy relaxed atmosphere,40 children are being taught by 3 staff.Rising 5's are busy sorting colours & counting.Younger 4's do directed activities{junk modelling, {sand & water play, home_corner,}& books.Each activity has it's own area. Sweet_making is the special activity today. After "apple time" the children choose freely & may go outside to play with large toys:_a boat,trains & bikes.The sand pit is popular in fine weather.A different group of 40 children attends in the afternoon.
